document.docAuthor: Gonzalez-Rodriguez, Liza M., García-Hernández, Andrea L. & Clarkson, Bruno
document.masterDocTitle: First records of water scavenger beetle species (Coleoptera, Hydrophilidae) from Quindío Department, Colombia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: First records of water scavenger beetle species (Coleoptera, Hydrophilidae) from Quindío Department, Colombia

subSubSection.paragraph:
Syn.: Spangler 1981: 158 , Fernández 1982: 34 .
Helochares ( Helochares ) abbreviatus Orchymont 1943: 55
.

Diagnosis. Body 6.60–6.70 mm long. Dorsal punctation on head, pronotum and elytra evenly fine and sparse. Mesoventral process slightly elevated. Last abdominal ventrite deeply notched. Parameres longer than median lobe; apices slightly rounded with inner margins produced and tooth-like projection on outer margins; dorsal lobule narrow, swollen apically with two protuberances; ventral lobule shorter and wider than dorsal lobule, acuminate at apex.

caption.paragraph: Table 1. List of species of Hydrophilidae from Colombia. * Without locality specification. ** Cited from Colombia by Blackwelder (1944) , but not by Zaitzev (1908) , Hansen (1999) , Short and Hebauer (2006) , and Short and Fikáček (2011) . *** Recently recorded without nominal identification ( Short et al. 2017 ).

subSubSection.paragraph: Geographic distribution. Argentina (Misiones), Bolivia , Brazil , Colombia , Costa Rica , Cuba , Guyana , Lesser Antilles, Panama , Paraguay , Surinam , and Venezuela . First record from Quindío Department.

Material examined. Colombia , Quindío Department , La Tebaida Municipality, Pizamal neighborhood, 04°41ʹ 30.1ʺ N , 075°83ʹ98.1ʺ W, 1057 m above mean sea level [a.m.s.l.], 2014-X-10. L.M. González col., CIUQ 10636– 10642 ( 8 males , 10 females )
Remarks. Specimens were collected from ponds with muddy/sandy and muddy/leaf litter substrates and in marshes with predominance of muddy substrate and saturated litter.
